languages.text: "Про сервиторшу ничего не знаю — у меня в жизни есть дела по-важнее, чем к мебели присматриваться. А корабль.. хм... вроде была одна "Кобра" с каким-то таким названием. Мы ее того — нежно взяли. На абордаж. Денз был в ударе тогда — после боя притащил связанного капитана на мостик, посадил с нами за стол — мы как раз дули капитанский {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасек{/g}. Хм... вам прям все рассказывать, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Про сервиторшу ничего не знаю — у меня в жизни есть дела по-важнее, чем к мебели присматриваться. А корабль.. хм... вроде была одна "Кобра" с каким-то таким названием. Мы ее того — нежно взяли. На абордаж. Денз был в ударе тогда — после боя притащил связанного капитана на мостик, посадил с нами за стол — мы как раз дули капитанский амасек. Хм... вам прям все рассказывать, да?"

languages.text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

Мы ее того — нежно взяли. На абордаж. Денз был в ударе тогда — после боя притащил связанного капитана на мостик, посадил с нами за стол — мы как раз дули капитанский {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасек{/g}. Хм... вам прям все рассказывать, да?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't know about the Servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's amasec. Hm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's amasec. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

languages.text: “我并不知道这个机仆的事情。我没时间盯着家具看，我还有别的事情要做。至于那艘船嘛……嗯……我记得以前有一艘眼镜蛇级的船叫这个名字。我们当时那是相当……呃……相当温柔地登上了那艘船。丹兹那天的表现真叫一个活跃。战斗结束之后，他把那艘船的舰长捆得结结实实，拖到了舰桥，让和我们一起坐在桌边。至于我们，我们在慢慢检查那个舰长的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}。嗯……你确定想把这个故事听完吗？”
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: “我并不知道这个奴工的事情。我没时间盯着家具看，我还有别的事情要做。至于那艘船嘛……嗯……我记得以前有一艘眼镜蛇级的船叫这个名字。我们当时那是相当……呃……相当温柔地登上了那艘船。丹兹那天的表现真叫一个活跃。战斗结束之后，他把那艘船的舰长捆得结结实实，拖到了舰桥，让和我们一起坐在桌边。至于我们，我们在慢慢检查那个舰长的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}。嗯……你确定想把这个故事听完吗？”

languages.text: «No sé nada de la servidora. Tengo cosas mejores que hacer con mi vida que mirar los muebles. En cuanto a la nave... mmm... me suena que hubo un navío de clase Cobra con ese nombre, o al menos algo parecido. Fuimos bastante suaves con él. Vamos, que lo abordamos. Ese día, Denz estaba sembrado. Después de la batalla, arrastró al capitán al puente, bien atado, y lo sentó a la mesa con nosotros. Estábamos dándole al {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} del capitán. Mmm... ¿Seguro que quieres saberlo todo?».
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: «No sé nada de la servidora. Tengo cosas mejores que hacer con mi vida que mirar los muebles. En cuanto a la nave... mmm... me suena que hubo un navío de clase Cobra con ese nombre, o al menos algo parecido. Fuimos bastante suaves con él. Vamos, que lo abordamos. Ese día, Denz estaba sembrado. Después de la batalla, arrastró al capitán al puente, bien atado, y lo sentó a la mesa con nosotros. Estábamos dándole al {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} del capitán. Mmm... ¿Seguro que quieres saberlo todo?».

languages.text: 「サーヴィターのことは知らない。家具をながめるほど暇な人生じゃないんでね。船の方は…コブラクラスの船で似たような名前のがあった気がする。まあまあ丁重に扱ったぞ。あの日のデンツは絶好調だった。戦いの後、敵船の船長を甲板まで引きずって縛り付けて、俺たちと一緒のテーブルに座らせたんだ。そいつが隠し持ってた{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}を飲みまくった。へっ…本当に全部聞きたいかい？」
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: 「サーヴィターのことは知らない。家具をながめるほど暇な人生じゃないんでね。船の方は…コブラクラスの船で似たような名前のがあった気がする。まあまあ丁重に扱ったぞ。あの日のデンツは絶好調だった。戦いの後、敵船の船長を甲板まで引きずって縛り付けて、俺たちと一緒のテーブルに座らせたんだ。そいつが隠し持ってた{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}を飲みまくった。へっ…本当に全部聞きたいかい？」

languages.text: "Ich weiß nichts über den Servitor – ich habe Besseres zu tun, als mir Möbel anzusehen. Und das Schiff ... hmm ... Ich glaube, es gab mal eine Kobra, die so oder ähnlich hieß. Wir sind recht, äh, behutsam damit umgegangen. Will sagen, wir haben sie geentert. Denz war damals auf dem Höhepunkt seines Schaffens – nach dem Kampf schleifte er den Captain gefesselt zur Brücke und setzte ihn mit uns an den Tisch – und dann tranken wird seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}. Hmm ... seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr alles hören wollt?"
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nichts über den Servitor – ich habe Besseres zu tun, als mir Möbel anzusehen. Und das Schiff ... hmm ... Ich glaube, es gab mal eine Kobra, die so oder ähnlich hieß. Wir sind recht, äh, behutsam damit umgegangen. Will sagen, wir haben sie geentert. Denz war damals auf dem Höhepunkt seines Schaffens – nach dem Kampf schleifte er den Captain gefesselt zur Brücke und setzte ihn mit uns an den Tisch – und dann tranken wird seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}. Hmm ... seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr alles hören wollt?"

languages.text: « Je ne sais rien de ce servitor, j'ai mieux à faire que de me préoccuper des meubles. Quant au vaisseau... Hmm... Je crois me souvenir d'un Cobra qui portait ce nom. On ne l'a pas trop malmené... quand on l'a abordé, je veux dire. Ce jour-là, Denz était au meilleur de sa forme. Après l'affrontement, il a traîné leur capitaine ligoté de la tête aux pieds jusqu'à la passerelle et l'a assis à table avec nous. On s'est sifflé sa réserve d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} et... Hmm... Vous voulez vraiment que je vous raconte toute l'histoire ? »
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais rien de ce servitor, j'ai mieux à faire que de me préoccuper des meubles. Quant au vaisseau... Hmm... Je crois me souvenir d'un Cobra qui portait ce nom. On ne l'a pas trop malmené... quand on l'a abordé, je veux dire. Ce jour-là, Denz était au meilleur de sa forme. Après l'affrontement, il a traîné leur capitaine ligoté de la tête aux pieds jusqu'à la passerelle et l'a assis à table avec nous. On s'est sifflé sa réserve d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} et... Hmm... Vous voulez vraiment que je vous raconte toute l'histoire ? »

languages.text: "Ben hizmetör falan bilmem, hayatta mobilyalara bakmaktan daha önemli işlerim var. Gemiye gelirsek... Hımm... Galiba 'Tövbe' veya benzeri isimde bir Kobra vardı. Kendisine çok... Narin davranmıştık. Çıkarma yapmıştık yani. Denz o gün formundaydı. Çatışmadan sonra kaptanı bağlayıp köprüye sürükledi ve bizimle masaya oturttu. Kaptanın {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} zulasının dibini görüyorduk. Hımm... Her şeyi ayrıntısıyla anlatayım mı yani?"
languages.original_text: "I don't know about the servitor — I've got better things to do in life than look at furniture. And the ship... hmm... I think there was one Cobra by that name or something similar. We were pretty, uh, gentle with it. Boarded it, I mean. Denz was on top of his game that day — after the battle, he dragged their captain to the bridge, all tied up, and sat him at the table with us — we were going through the captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Hmm... so you're sure you wanna hear everything?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben servitör falan bilmem, hayatta mobilyalara bakmaktan daha önemli işlerim var. Gemiye gelirsek... Hımm... Sanırım o veya benzer isme sahip bir Kobra vardı. Çok narin davranmıştık kendisine. Binmiştik yani. Denz o gün formundaydı. Savaştan sonra kaptanı bağlayıp köprüye sürükledi ve bizimle birlikte masaya oturttu. Kaptanın {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g}ini içiyorduk. Hımm... Her şeyi duymak istediğinize emin misiniz?"
